thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 15 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Third Point Raises Share Stake in Facebook, Takes Share Stake in Worldpay

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Third Point Raises Share Stake in Facebook, Takes Share Stake in Worldpay
text:
May 15 (Reuters) - THIRD POINT LLC:
* THIRD POINT LLC TAKES SHARE STAKE OF 400,000 SHARES IN ADOBE SYSTEMS INC - SEC FILING
* THIRD POINT LLC RAISES SHARE STAKE IN FACEBOOK INC BY 17.6 PERCENT TO 4 MILLION CLASS A SHARES
* THIRD POINT LLC TAKES SHARE STAKE OF 4.1 MILLION CLASS A SHARES IN WORLDPAY INC
* THIRD POINT LLC DISSOVES SHARE STAKE IN SOUTHWESTERN ENERGY CO
* THIRD POINT LLC - CHANGE IN HOLDINGS ARE AS OF MARCH 31, 2018 AND COMPARED WITH THE PREVIOUS QUARTER ENDED AS OF DEC 31, 2017 Source text for the quarter ended Mar 31, 2018: ( bit.ly/2IjmYBd ) Source text for quarter ended Dec 31, 2017: ( bit.ly/2BtZhBz )
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
